title: Establishing the President's Make America Beautiful Again Commission
summary: The document is an executive order titled "Establishing the President's Make America Beautiful Again Commission," issued on July 3, 2025. It aims to prioritize the conservation of national parks, public lands, and outdoor recreation areas, addressing issues like deferred maintenance and restricted access. The order establishes a commission chaired by the Secretary of the Interior to advise on conservation efforts, expand access to public lands, and promote economic growth through responsible stewardship. Key policies include cutting bureaucratic delays, recovering fish and wildlife populations, and expanding outdoor recreation opportunities. The order emphasizes collaboration and voluntary conservation efforts over regulation.
